short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cutting cards is a hastle no more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This item allows you to input information into a form and then spits out a fully formatted card for debate. You should install it because it will help you more easily gather information for Speech and Debate.
